Montgomery.McBryde\u2013Screws\u2013Tyson House: The McBryde–Screws–Tyson House, also known as the Tyson House, is a historic Greek Revival style house in Montgomery, Alabama. The two-story frame building was completed in 1832 and the Greek Revival facade added in 1855. It was added to the National Register of Historic Places on November 28, 1980.
